name: 譚巽言
objective:
1.Introduction to microcomputer 
2.Central processor unit 
3.Microprogramming set 
4.Assemblylanguage programming 
5.Interfacing circuits 
6.ROM/RAM interface 
7.I/O operations 
8.Interrupt and direct memory access
schedule:
1--2: Basic Computer Concepts
3--11: Assembly language
  (1) Intel X86 Architecture 
  (2) Using MASM and debuggers 
  (3) Memory Addressing 
  (4) Program Structure (Branches & Loops) 
  (5) I/O Processing 
  (6) Macro Writing 
  (7) Linking to High Level Languages 
  (8) Case Studies
11--17: 
  (1) Interfacing circuits 
  (2) ROM/RAM interface 
  (3) I/O operations 
  (4) Interrupts
scorePolicy:
Evaluation:
1.Midterm （paper examination） 30%
2.Final （Writing a selection program on computer） 30%
3.Programming assignments 40%
materials: Reference Digital logic, Micro-computers and Assembly language
